An Eco-friendly company with real values
Our team consists of certified painters committed to delivering exceptional results you can trust.
We specialize in transforming visions into reality. Whether it’s a single room or an entire property, we tailor every project to meet your style, budget, and expectations.
Get your dream home with expert help.
We visit your space, discuss goals, colours, and budget, then provide a detailed, no-obligation estimate.
Our experts help you choose eco-friendly paints and finishes that suit your style, timeline, and budget.
Furniture is covered, surfaces are cleaned, repaired, sanded, and primed to ensure a flawless finish.
Skilled painters apply premium coatings with precision and efficiency, minimising disruption.
We walk through every detail with you, handle any touch-ups, and leave the site spotless—guaranteed.

The Aesthetics Agenda: Redefining Interior Elegance
At NextSpace, we are passionate about creating exceptional interior and designs that elevate lifestyles and enrich experiences.
We specialize in transforming visions into reality. Explore our portfolio of innovative architectural and interior design projects crafted with precision.
Transform your space with professional interior painting that combines flawless finishes, durable materials, and colour expertise.
We use high-quality, environmentally friendly paints that deliver rich colour while minimising odour and harmful emissions.
Our team thoroughly cleans, sands, and primes every surface to ensure a smooth, long-lasting finish.
Get expert advice on colour selection and accent walls to achieve the perfect aesthetic for your home or workspace.
High-performance painting solutions for offices, warehouses, retail, and industrial facilities—delivered on schedule with minimal disruption.
We specify low-maintenance, high-build paints and protective systems engineered for heavy traffic and demanding environmental conditions.
Night, weekend, or phased plans keep your business running while our certified team coordinates every detail to meet tight timelines.
Fully insured crew adheres to all OSHA/WorkSafe standards, with comprehensive site protection and post-project cleanup.
Boost curb appeal and protect your property with professional exterior painting using weather-resistant coatings and expert surface preparation.
We apply premium, UV-stable paints and sealers that withstand harsh sun, rain, and temperature swings.
Power washing, scraping, sanding, and priming ensure optimal adhesion and a long-lasting finish.
We carefully mask windows, landscaping, and fixtures, then leave your property spotless when the job is done.
Interior painting, exterior painting, comercial painting, mould treatment, maintenance

Answers to common questions about our eco-friendly painting services, process, and guarantees.
Absolutely. We offer a complimentary on-site consultation and a detailed, no-obligation quote for every project.
What paints do you use? Are they eco-friendly?
We prioritise eco-certified paints that provide vibrant colour and durability while keeping indoor air quality safe. We can also use your favorite paint.
How long will my project take?
Most residential rooms are completed in one to two days. Larger or multi-room projects are scheduled to minimise disruption, and we’ll give you a precise timeline before work begins.
Do I need to move furniture or cover floors?
No. Our crew handles all prep work—moving light furniture, covering floors and fixtures, and protecting your belongings throughout the project.
Yes. All workmanship is covered by a written warranty. If any issues arise within the warranty period, we’ll return promptly to make it right.
Yes. We carry full public liability insurance and all necessary trade licences, so you can have complete peace of mind.
We encourage clients to actively participate in discussions, share their ideas, preferences, and feedback.
